import React from"react";import ApexCharts from"react-apexcharts";import{useTheme}from"@material-ui/styles";export default function ApexLineChart(props){var theme=useTheme();var options={dataLabels:{enabled:false},stroke:{curve:"stepline",width:0},markers:{size:6,shape:"square",colors:["#008FFB"]},xaxis:{tickAmount:15,min:0,max:300},yaxis:{min:0,max:40},colors:[theme.palette.primary.main,theme.palette.success.main],chart:{toolbar:{show:false}},legend:{show:false}};var series=[{name:"row1",data:props.data}];return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ApexCharts,{options:options,series:series,type:"line",height:350});}// ############################################################
